(Uh...seeing how Code is dismissed, for now at least, Kamodia and Wrath would 
still be in the Ark)

Activating internal defenses, Ramhorn watched on a screen,  two autoguns 
lowered, one firing five rapid blasts at Kamodia, the other firing three at 
Wrath.
